name: dfs.client.retry.max.attempts
description: Max retry attempts for DFSClient talking to namenodes.

name: mapreduce.shuffle.listen.queue.size
description: The length of the shuffle server listen queue.

name: dfs.datanode.min.outlier.detection.disks
description: Minimum number of disks to run outlier detection.

name: mapreduce.job.local-fs.single-disk-limit.check.interval-ms
description: Interval of disk limit check to run in ms.

name: dfs.datanode.slowpeer.low.threshold.ms
description: Threshold in milliseconds below which a DataNode is definitely not slow.

name: dfs.qjournal.write-txns.timeout.ms
description:
Write timeout in milliseconds when writing to a quorum of remote
    journals.

name: dfs.namenode.edits.dir.minimum
description:
dfs.namenode.edits.dir includes both required directories
    (specified by dfs.namenode.edits.dir.required) and optional directories.

    The number of usable optional directories must be greater than or equal
    to this property.  If the number of usable optional directories falls
    below dfs.namenode.edits.dir.minimum, HDFS will issue an error.

    This property defaults to 1.
